metadata.title: CVE-2014-4720 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Email::Address module before 1.904 for Perl uses an inefficient regularexpression, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPUconsumption) via vectors related to "backtracking into the phrase," adifferent vulnerability than CVE-2014-0477.

criterions.comment: libemail-address-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
